offer_settings.terms:
<p>Hotel Villa Gloria is located on the western edge of Marienbad in a peaceful setting surrounded by woods and parks near the center and spa colonnade. Offers accommodation in 14 spacious rooms that are tastefully furnished and nicely blends in with the unique atmosphere of this Art Nouveau hotel.There are double rooms / double rooms in De luxe / family apartments for 2-4 persons / rooms in Suite with a capacity of 2-4 persons. The room rate includes a rich breakfast buffet. In the rooms you can find mini bar, refrigerator, cable TV and social amenities. There is a Wi-Fi connection for free of charge in the whole hotel. At your request the hotel staff will prepare a welcome drink, flowers, sweets or other consideration for you or your company. In the summer we recommend sitting on a sunny terrace. During your stay in Marienbad we will be glad to book the tickets for cultural events or for a trip to one of the sights around – State castle Kynžvart, State castle Bečov, Monastery Teplá.</p>
<p>This offer is valid only for payments made with Diners Club cards and cannot be combined with any other offers.</p>
